ygData.subject: Re: Skill Changes
ygData.msgSnippet: I agree with you Lemac.....a lot of my friends think I m nuts because I spend my evenings in EQ when I get home from work until I go to bed.  But when I ask
ygData.messageBody:
I agree with you Lemac.....a lot of my friends think I'm nuts because I
spend my evenings in EQ when I get home from work until I go to bed. But
when I ask them what THEY did, they spent 4 - 5 hours watching TV. Oh yeah,
that's REAL stimulating...::rolls her eyes::

I view my time in EQ as entertainment that I enjoy. If some people like to
spend their free time doing something else, that's their perogative.
Different strokes for different folks......just don't criticize me for doing
something with my time that I thoroughly enjoy. When it stops being fun,
I'll spend those hours doing something else I enjoy. Til then...see you all
in Norrath.....

Mikaela R'achai of The Rathe
